channel.title: How do i not lose items when im in castle wars area?
channel.description:
how do i make castle wars area so when u die there u dont loose items,can someone please tell me becuase i think its very hard trying to figure out how to do it.
i tried looking at applydead cuz my friend said its in there but i dont know what to do?? please someone help me ill rep u when i release my server.

item.title: How do i not lose items when im in castle wars area?
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

search for public void youdied()

you will see removeAllItems();
you will see this 2 time delet both and there you go

Read full topic

Sorta like how you make it so people don’t get attacked outside of the wilderness… I dont have any of my old stuff due to me getting a new computer or i would be more help
